doc.title: ASCII

value.content: ASCII (American Standard Code for Information Interchange) is one of the most popular coding method used by computers for converting letters, numbers, punctuation and control codes into digital form. Since 2007, UTF-8 superseded it on the Web.

value.title: See also
value.content: ASCII on Wikipedia
